text: Slabki skazhutʹ tym, yaki vyvyshchuvalysya: «Vy khytruvaly vnochi ta vdenʹ, koly nakazuvaly, shchob my ne viryly v Allaha ta shchob dodavaly Yomu rivnykh!» Vony prykhovayutʹ svoye kayattya, koly pobachatʹ karu. I My naklademo kaydany na shyyi neviruyuchykh! Khiba ne vidplachuyutʹ yim tilʹky za te, shcho vony robyly
